title: Twitter to Ban Political Ads
text:
Twitter Inc. is banning political advertising from its platform, a move that comes as social-media firms have faced scrutiny over promoting messages that potentially contain false or misleading information.

In a series of tweets on Wednesday, Twitter Chief Executive Jack Dorsey explained he believes political messages should be “earned, not bought.” The new policy will be enforced Nov. 22, he said. Twitter also said it will allow some exceptions, such as ads in support of voter registration.
